mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qna_reply WHERE id = #{id} AND user_user_id = #{user_user_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna_reply (id, created_at, modified_at, is_delete ,comment, user_user_id, notice_comment_id) VALUES (#{id}, now(), now(), #{is_delete}, #{comment}, #{user_user_id}, #(notice_comment_id) )
mapper.select: SELECT id, created_at, modified_at, is_delete ,comment, user_user_id, notice_comment_id FROM qna_reply WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY created_at ASC, id ASC
